proposals.example: Tom is traveling to Berlin week(next)
proposals.gesture: Use the index of the right hand to point and move the cursor, then typing
Use the index and thump finger of the right hand and then pinch to and move the hand to move it, then release fingers to let go
proposals.reasons: Similar to real life objects moving

proposals.example: What took you so long so long?
proposals.gesture: Use index and thump fingers to select, expand them to select multiple words, then move my index to top to delete it
proposals.notes: She first suggested to use the keyboard for deletion, but she changed her mind, she said i want to use my hand because it is quickerShe also suggested to use the keyboard for selection

proposals.gesture: Move the cursor with the index of the right hand, then select with the index and thumb by expanding, then move the selected text to desired postion as the whole hand move
proposals.reasons: We don't have drage option with keyboard, so I guess it is better
proposals.notes: The participant had some concerns that smaller words may not be selected in this way

proposals.example: He likes to eat healthy when visiting visiting restaurants
proposals.gesture: Double taping on the word will select it, then move the index up to delete it
proposals.notes: She thinks delete with the index by moving it up or down is equally fine

proposals.example: How far had Morino lived in America?
proposals.gesture: (similar to delete single) Move the cursor with the index of the right hand with double tap to select it, then move index up to delete it, then type

proposals.example: How long have her had this fever? (have her-> has she)
proposals.gesture: (similar to delete group) Use index and thumb fingers to select, expand them to select multiple words, then move my index to top to delete it, then type

comments: She asked if this product is already there in the market and whether it can detect the hands correactly.
